Html:
Dear Sir,
I know it may be complex and out of scope of this great project, but I am sure that this great library will amaze me one more.

I have a wav file , i need to match it to see which wav from a library of waves (15 files only) is close to it. I know this will need Fourier Transformation. I know that this library uses it too.

Any advise .
Thanks,
I'm afraid NAudio does not include this functionality. It';s actually a difficult problem to solve. Search for "audio fingerprinting" to read more about approaches you can take.
